attributes.action: Give Lincolnshire proper roads and dual the A17
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lincolnshire has the worst road network in the UK for the amount of heavy vehicles it has to carry, Give us an East Coast motorway or at least dual carriageway most of the A17 from Norwich to Newark. We want proper roads for our money not the smokey 30 year old buses that are passed off as public transport (usually carrying 4 OAP's)

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
